import React from 'react'; import play_icon from '../../assets/icons8-play-button-30.png'; import pause_icon from '../../assets/pause.png' import arrow_btn from '../../assets/right-arrow (1).png' const Hero = ({setPlayStatus,heroData,heroCount,setHeroCount,playStatus}) => { return (

{heroData.text1}

{ heroData.text2}

Explore features

  • setHeroCount(0)} className={heroCount===0?"hero-dot-orange":"hero-dot"}>
  • setHeroCount(1)} className={heroCount === 1 ? "hero-dot-orange" : "hero-dot"}>
  • setHeroCount(2)} className={heroCount===2?"hero-dot-orange":"hero-dot"}>
setPlayStatus(!playStatus)} src={ playStatus?pause_icon:play_icon} alt=""/>
) }
